DOC.brief_title: Acute Maternal Fetal Effects Exercise Pregnancy
DOC.detailed_description: Background : Exercise encourage pregnancy order reduce undesirable outcome pre-eclampsia , excessive weight gain diabetes . Despite widespread among pregnant woman obstetrician , little know acute effect mother fetus time exercise , exist research control pre-and post-exercise . Objective : To study acute effect two moderate modality exercise pregnant woman fetus . Methods : This open randomize controlled trial conduct Campina Grande , Brazil , December 2011 December 2012 . The pregnant woman gestational age 35 37 week randomize two group moderate-intensity exercise : treadmill stationary bicycle . Pregnant woman fetus monitor 60 minute divide three step 20 minute : baseline assessment , monitor exercise recovery period . Women monitor use record equipment ABPM ( ambulatory blood pressure monitorization ) fetal heart rate monitor computerized cardiotocography . Blood collected measure blood glucose , total cholesterol HDL , nitrate lactate , exercise . The intensity exercise maintain 60 % 80 % maximum heart rate Karvonen formula , addition subjective perception exertion modify Borg scale ( moderate intensity ) . During monitoring period ( three moment mention ) blood collect measurement glucose , total cholesterol HDL , nitrate lactate . The analysis variable : maternal heart rate blood pressure , fetal heart rate , number fetal movement , transient acceleration , deceleration , short-term variability , episodes high variability , uterine tone , glucose , lactate , nitrate , total cholesterol HDL Statistical Analysis : Statistical analysis perform use Epi Info 3.5.3 Medcalc 11.6.6.0 high version available time . The analysis base intention treat , accord recommendation CONSORT ( 2010 ) . For comparison level glucose , lactate , cholesterol , nitrate , maternal blood pressure , maternal fetal heart rate , fetal movement , transient acceleration , deceleration , change short-term episode high variation , uterine tone two group parametric test use ( Student 's ) variables normal distribution , otherwise evaluate use nonparametric test Mann-Whitney . To determine association mode exercise frequency fetal bradycardia chi-square test association ( Pearson ) use 5 % significance level . The risk ratio ( RR ) calculate measure relative risk , well 95 % confidence interval . If significant difference rate bradycardia demonstrate group , NNH ( Number Need Harm ) calculate .
